QuestData.Title: Changing of the Gar'dul
QuestData.Description: When Bloodhilt arrives, I'd like to - ah - talk in private. Can you accompany me to make sure things stay on the level? This Bloodhilt is a, ah, he's a, he's a loose cannon.$B$B<Gar'dul tries to compose himself.>$B$BMeet me atop the northern tower and we'll talk with Bloodhilt together.
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to the top of the northern tower in Desolation Hold and help Warlord Bloodhilt "Relieve" Gar'dul of command.
QuestData.RewardText: You've just learned a little something about the inner workings of Horde high command.$B$BWarlord Bloodhilt is in charge of Desolation Hold now. He may have more for you to do in the courtyard below.

Objectives.Objective: Go to the Top of the Tower
